title: Post-Event Feedback Form
description: Collect attendee opinions after a conference, webinar, or workshop to evaluate success and areas for improvement.

intro.title: Thank You for Attending!
intro.description: We appreciate your participation in our recent event. Your feedback is invaluable in helping us improve future events. This survey will take approximately 3-5 minutes to complete.

event_rating.title: Rate the Overall Event
event_rating.description: How would you rate your overall experience at the event?

favorite_aspect.title: Favorite Aspect
favorite_aspect.description: What was your favorite part of the event?

favorite_aspect_other.title: If Other, please specify
favorite_aspect_other.description: Please tell us what your favorite aspect was.

best_session.title: Which Session Was Most Valuable?
best_session.description: Please select the session that provided the most value to you.
enum: Session A: Introduction to the Topic

improvement_suggestions.title: Any suggestions for improvement?
improvement_suggestions.description: Please share any specific feedback on how we could improve future events.
improvement_suggestions.placeholder: Your suggestions help us make our events better...

would_attend_again.title: Would you attend a similar event in the future?
would_attend_again.description: Let us know if you'd be interested in future events.

closing_note.title: Thank You for Your Feedback!
closing_note.description: We appreciate your input and look forward to seeing you at our next event. Follow us on social media for updates on upcoming events and resources.
